Pre-Game Insights: USA will host Canada in the opening match of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 in Dallas, Texas.
Monank Patel will lead USA in their debut ICC World Cup tournament.
USA's vice-captain Aaron Jones emphasized the team's focus on playing 'fearless' cricket.
Canada's captain Saad bin Zafar expressed excitement and readiness for tough competition.
USA recently won a 2-1 series against Bangladesh, boosting their confidence.
Canada lost their recent five-match T20 series against USA 4-0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will take place at Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas, United States.
USA and Canada have a historical rivalry, having played the first recorded international cricket match in history.
USA have won five out of seven T20 matches against Canada.
The USA team aims to capture the imagination of mainstream American sports fans with their performance.
Canada's squad includes players like Saad bin Zafar, Navneet Dhaliwal, and Aaron Johnson.
USA's squad includes players like Monank Patel, Shayan Jahangir, and Ali Khan.
